Subject: Speed typography for 17th floor - pillar 1
 
Hi Akash,
Pls get the sample made of the attached typography of 'Speed is our bet on the market' for 17th floor pillar no 1. 

Size of the creative: 4ft 1inch x 4ft 7inch. 
Pls make sure that the corners of the frame are also covered  while printing and not kept white. We have given a 3inch bleed on all sides.

Attaching jpg, print pdf and illustrator file for printer use. 
 
Thanks,
Priya

Hi Priya,
 
 
Requesting you to arrange the approved PR to proceed further.
 
 
Thanks & Regards,
 
Akash Chaudhary
Purchase
+91-8527243007
 
From: Priya Saini <priya.saini@paytm.com>
Sent: 17 July 2025 18:56
To: Akash Chaudhary <akash2.chaudhary@paytm.com>
Cc: Gautam Verma <gautam2.verma@paytm.com>; Salil Wadhawan <salil.wadhawan@paytm.com>; Ishita Bhatia <ishita1.bhatia@paytm.com>; One97 Communications Limited <support@paytm-designocl.freshdesk.com>
Subject: Speed typography for 17th floor - pillar 1
 
Hi Akash,
Pls get the sample made of the attached typography of 'Speed is our bet on the market' for 17th floor pillar no 1. 

Size of the creative: 4ft 1inch x 4ft 7inch. 
Pls make sure that the corners of the frame are also covered  while printing and not kept white. We have given a 3inch bleed on all sides.

Attaching jpg, print pdf and illustrator file for printer use. 
 
Thanks,
Priya

body_text:
Ok
Approved as requested.

Regards,
Gsry
